/>
Introduction
This topic contains miscellaneous cardiovascular concepts and principles, including
definition of arteriosclerotic heart disease
documentation required to support a diagnosis of arteriosclerotic heart disease
manifestations of advanced arteriosclerotic disease in service
documentation of myocardial infarction (MI)
effective dates and liberalizing changes affecting service connection (SC) for ischemic heart disease (IHD)
considering cardiovascular conditions subsequent to amputation
effects of rheumatic heart disease
, and
definition of congenital heart defects.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 5 - Cardiovascular System Conditions
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 5, Section None
